===Overview===
The Yardies are Jamaican criminal organizations, whose biggest criminal activity is the drug trade, from the smuggling of drugs into the [[United States]], to the distribution of the drugs across the nation, and finally to retail sales on the street.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 89|90}}

===Yardies Groups===
